title: Video From Kathua Passed Off as Residents Protesting in Surat
subtitle: Fact Check Surat Residents Protesting Against Unavailability of Food: A video which shows people on the streets protesting is being widely shared with a claim that these are the residents of Surat who have come out because of unavailability of food.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video that shows hundreds of people on the streets protesting is being widely shared on Facebook with a false claim that these are the residents of Surat, Gujarat who have come out on the streets because of the unavailability of food due to the coronavirus lockdown.

However, we found out that the video is from Kathua in Jammu and Kashmir, where protest by the workers of Chenab Textile Mills turned violent on 8 May. The workers were demanding payment of their full salaries.
